channel.title: scala on Gopher's Blog
channel.description: Recent content in scala on Gopher's Blog

item.title: Scala CheatSheet
item.description: This cheat sheet originated from the forum, credits to Laurent Poulain. We copied it and changed or added a few things. There are certainly a lot of things that can be improved! If you would like to contribute, you have two options: Click the “Edit” button on this file on GitHub: https://github.com/lampepfl/progfun-wiki/blob/gh-pages/CheatSheet.md You can submit a pull request directly from there without checking out the git repository to your local machine.

item.title: Scala Learning Resources
item.description: #Quick References Scala Standard Library API Scala School!: A Scala tutorial by Twitter A Tour of Scala: Tutorial indroducing the main concepts of Scala Scala Overview on StackOverflow: A list of useful questions sorted by topic #Week 1 Martin’s talk at OSCON 2011: Working Hard to Keep it Simple (slides) Books: Structure and Interpretation of Computer Programs. Harold Abelson and Gerald J. Sussman. 2nd edition. MIT Press 1996.

item.title: 解决sbt更新scala速度慢
item.description: 在国内如果要使用sbt更新scala时，速度是一个硬伤，因为国内访问maven库的速度确实很慢，因此在这里给出相应的解决方案。 编辑sbtco
